title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend
description:
We're seeking a Senior Software Engineer to build scalable backend systems for our high-growth SaaS platform serving 100K+ enterprise users.

Responsibilities:
• Design and implement distributed microservices architecture using Python, Java, or Go
• Build RESTful APIs and GraphQL services with focus on performance and reliability
• Optimize database queries (SQL/NoSQL) and implement caching strategies
• Collaborate with product and data teams to deliver features that drive user engagement
• Mentor junior engineers and contribute to technical architecture decisions
• Write clean, maintainable code with comprehensive test coverage

Requirements:
• 5+ years backend development experience with Python, Java, or similar
• Strong SQL skills and experience with PostgreSQL, MySQL, or similar RDBMS
• Experience building and scaling APIs serving millions of requests
• Proficiency with AWS, GCP, or Azure cloud platforms
• Understanding of CI/CD, containerization (Docker/Kubernetes)
• Strong problem-solving skills and data-driven approach to decision making

Nice to have:
• Experience with data analytics and building internal tools
• Background in EdTech, FinTech, or Insurance Tech
• Contributions to open source projects

title: Senior Data Analyst
description:
Join our data team to drive strategic insights that shape product and business decisions. You'll work cross-functionally to analyze user behavior, market trends, and business metrics.

Responsibilities:
• Analyze large datasets using SQL, Python, and statistical methods to uncover insights
• Build dashboards and reports in Tableau, Looker, or PowerBI for stakeholders
• Conduct A/B tests and experiments to measure feature impact
• Partner with product, engineering, and business teams to define KPIs and track metrics
• Identify growth opportunities through market analysis and competitive research
• Present findings and recommendations to leadership with clear data storytelling

Requirements:
• 4+ years experience in data analysis role
• Expert-level SQL skills; proficiency with Python or R for statistical analysis
• Experience with BI tools (Tableau, Looker, PowerBI)
• Strong understanding of statistical methods and experimental design
• Proven track record of translating data into actionable business insights
• Excellent communication skills with ability to present to non-technical audiences

Nice to have:
• Experience in insurance, financial services, or EdTech
• Knowledge of predictive modeling and machine learning
• Familiarity with ETL processes and data pipelines

title: Senior Product Manager
description:
We're looking for a strategic Product Manager to lead development of our core platform features. You'll own the product roadmap, drive user-centered design, and ship features that delight customers.

Responsibilities:
• Define product vision and strategy aligned with business goals
• Conduct user research through interviews, surveys, and data analysis to inform roadmap
• Collaborate with engineering, design, and data teams to ship high-impact features
• Use analytics to measure feature adoption, engagement, and business impact
• Lead sprint planning, prioritization, and stakeholder communication
• Drive go-to-market strategy for new product launches

Requirements:
• 5+ years product management experience, preferably in B2B SaaS
• Strong analytical skills with proficiency in SQL and product analytics tools
• Experience conducting user research and applying human-centered design principles
• Proven ability to ship products from 0 to 1 and scale existing features
• Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills
• Data-driven decision making with focus on metrics and user outcomes

Nice to have:
• Technical background or engineering degree
• Experience in EdTech, InsurTech, or marketplace products
• MBA or equivalent business strategy experience

title: Management Consultant - Strategy & Operations
description:
Join our strategy consulting practice to solve complex business challenges for Fortune 500 clients. You'll lead market analysis, develop growth strategies, and drive operational improvements.

Responsibilities:
• Lead client engagements focused on growth strategy, market entry, and operational excellence
• Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities
• Build financial models and business cases to support strategic recommendations
• Facilitate workshops with C-suite executives to align on priorities
• Analyze data to uncover insights and drive evidence-based recommendations
• Mentor junior consultants and contribute to firm thought leadership

Requirements:
• 3-5 years consulting experience at top-tier firm or equivalent
• Strong analytical skills with proficiency in Excel, SQL, and data visualization
• Experience across multiple industries (financial services, insurance, tech preferred)
• Excellent executive presence and stakeholder management
• MBA from top business school or equivalent experience
• Track record of driving measurable client impact ($100M+ portfolio experience valued)

Nice to have:
• Experience in insurance pricing, underwriting, or risk analytics
• Background in venture-backed startups or entrepreneurship
• Advanced analytics skills (Python, R, statistical modeling)

title: Senior Account Manager - Enterprise
description:
Manage relationships with our largest enterprise clients (Fortune 1000) to drive retention, expansion, and customer success. Own $20M+ in annual recurring revenue.

Responsibilities:
• Serve as primary contact for portfolio of 15-20 enterprise accounts
• Drive renewals, upsells, and expansion within existing customer base
• Conduct quarterly business reviews showcasing value and ROI
• Collaborate with product and support teams to resolve customer issues
• Identify growth opportunities through data analysis of usage patterns
• Build executive relationships and influence strategic decisions

Requirements:
• 5+ years enterprise account management or customer success experience
• Proven track record managing $10M+ ARR portfolio with 95%+ retention
• Strong business acumen and ability to articulate value proposition
• Experience using CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot) and analytics tools
• Excellent communication and negotiation skills
• Data-driven approach to identifying risks and opportunities

Nice to have:
• Experience in B2B SaaS, EdTech, or Financial Services
• Background in consulting or analytics
• Technical understanding of software products

title: Product Marketing Manager
description:
Drive go-to-market strategy and growth initiatives for our B2B product portfolio. Own positioning, messaging, and campaigns that drive pipeline and revenue.

Responsibilities:
• Develop product positioning and messaging based on customer insights and market research
• Lead go-to-market launches for new products and features
• Create compelling content (case studies, whitepapers, webinars) that drives demand
• Analyze campaign performance and optimize based on conversion metrics
• Partner with sales to develop enablement materials and competitive intelligence
• Conduct customer interviews and market research to inform strategy

Requirements:
• 4+ years product marketing or growth marketing experience in B2B SaaS
• Strong analytical skills with experience using marketing analytics tools
• Proven ability to drive measurable results (pipeline, conversion, engagement)
• Excellent storytelling and content creation skills
• Experience managing cross-functional stakeholders
• Data-driven approach to campaign optimization

Nice to have:
• Experience marketing to education, insurance, or financial services sectors
• Background in product management or user research
• Familiarity with marketing automation platforms (HubSpot, Marketo)

title: Senior Project Manager - Digital Transformation
description:
Lead complex digital transformation initiatives for enterprise clients. Manage cross-functional teams, drive execution, and ensure projects deliver on time and within budget.

Responsibilities:
• Manage end-to-end delivery of enterprise software implementations ($5M+ projects)
• Lead cross-functional teams of 10-20 people across engineering, product, and operations
• Define project scope, timelines, and success metrics in partnership with stakeholders
• Identify and mitigate risks; escalate issues and drive resolution
• Track project health using data and analytics; report status to executives
• Drive adoption and change management with client organizations

Requirements:
• 5+ years project management experience delivering complex technology projects
• PMP or equivalent certification preferred
• Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies and project management tools (Jira, Asana)
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Excellent stakeholder management and communication abilities
• Proven track record delivering projects on time and within budget

Nice to have:
• Experience in insurance, financial services, or EdTech
• Technical background or engineering degree
• Change management certification or experience
